meanings.definition: A set of related events, movements, or items that follow each other in a particular order.
meanings.sent1: The sequence of numbers on the clock helped me tell the time.
meanings.sent2: She followed the sequence of steps to bake a cake.
meanings.sent3: The sequence of events at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sequence of colors in the rainbow is always beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The sequence of letters in the alphabet is important for learning to read.

meanings.definition: A particular order in which related things follow each other.
meanings.sent1: The sequence of songs on the playlist was perfect for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: He memorized the sequence of numbers for the safe.
meanings.sent3: The sequence of flavors in the ice cream surprised her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The sequence of steps in the dance routine was challenging but fun.
meanings.sent5: The sequence of events in the story kept me on the edge of my seat.
